website_summaries.verdict: Most affordable tap handle for your home kegerator.
pros: FDA food-grade certificated product that includes a flow control feature
This is most helpful as it shuts off automatically when not in use and less beer is wasted
cons: Users reported few issues with this product

customer_reviews.title: NOT as advertised
customer_reviews.text: After hours of removing my tower, drilling the tower and installing the faucet and new lines, I realized there is NO flow control. NO FLOW CONTROL. The main purpose in buying this item. Probably my stupidity for not checking first because it is inexpensive. I just did not believe the add would be totally false. Amazon refunded $10, thank you, but it is the seller who should be at fault.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Springs are good - but no black specs is better
customer_reviews.text: No more black specs in my beer! I have heard that it might happen. but this design is quite nice. Really like the spring return
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Well made with a nice finish
customer_reviews.text: These work great and look great too! It comes with a shank collar designed to fit a round riser. We chose to not use that and simply substituted a 7/8” washer which fits the shank perfectly and allows the collet that the faucet attaches to to float as is necessary for it to function properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry @ Fortlandia

customer_reviews.title: I received on time, replaces the one that came ...
customer_reviews.text: I received on time, replaces the one that came with my kegerator, this one has a down spout making it so the line has no kinks.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. I love the spring that is included so tap is always closed when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these installed on my beerfest serving rig. I love the spring back feature. Easy to install, and maintain and you can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: ck 80

customer_reviews.title: Great tap head
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tap head it's spring loaded so it shuts off automatically, it's firm and feels good in the hand ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Fensterwald

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a home kegger machine
customer_reviews.text: This was a long needed upgrade to our 25 year old machine. The auto shut off feature will save us beer because the old had to be pushed hard to make stop. This one you let go of the handle and it shuts off.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Has plastic parts and sticks after a while
customer_reviews.text: Plastic parts where you don't need them to be and after letting it sit for a day, I had to really give it a tug to open it again to get the beer to come out.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, self-closing feature is great.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, really like the way it snaps back closed, and it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Reinwald

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've had them almost a year, bought 2, they work fine!
customer_reviews.author: kirksaaa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Just found a way to "Hold" the tap open for pitchers, growlers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Grant
